title: Clear all website content and render a blank empty page

requirements.text: Remove all page sections (Header, Hero, Courses, MockTest, WhyChoose, Library, Contact, Footer) from the frontend and replace the entire app with a single blank, empty page that renders nothing visible to the user.
acceptanceCriteria: The deployed site shows a completely blank page with no text, images, or UI elements.
All section components (Header, Hero, Courses, MockTest, WhyChoose, Library, Contact, Footer) are removed from App.tsx.
No navigation, branding, or content is visible on the page.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/main.tsx.
Do not delete or break the backend actor in backend/main.mo.
nonGoals: Deleting the project or its deployment infrastructure.
Adding any new content or features.
